text: Lance Melvin Larson (July 3, 1940 â€“ January 19, 2024) was an American competition swimmer. He won a gold medal at the 1960 Summer Olympics and a silver medal at the same event. Larson died on January 19, 2024 in Orange, California at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American swimmers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from California
